movies.title: Hyde Park on Hudson
movies.plot: The story of the love affair between FDR and his distant cousin Margaret Stuckley, centered around the weekend in 1939 when the King and Queen of the United Kingdom visited upstate New York.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.

events.title: King George VI and queen Elizabeth arrive to stay with President Roosevelt
King George VI joins FDR for a picnic and eats a hotdog

movies.title: Chunuk Bair
movies.plot: The tragedy of Gallipoli is exposed
